name: minsky-link
description: An Atom Plugin to bring Github/Gitlab Issues to the Atom UI.

scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run prettier-check

author: Ben Klein, Brian Lundell, Ian Lumsden, Jonathan Bueckman

enable_viewmode_drawers.title: Enable Drawers
enable_viewmode_drawers.description: Enables inline, resizable and collapsible drawers.

enable_viewmode_hoverover.title: Show snippets on hover
enable_viewmode_hoverover.description: Enables snippets to be shown when you hover over a issue tag.

enable_viewmode_panes.title: Enable Panes
enable_viewmode_panes.description: Enables issue pages to be expanded to full panes.

issue_tag_regex.title: Issue Regex Tag
issue_tag_regex.description: Allows changing the regex used to locate issue tags

default_drawer_height.title: Drawer Height
default_drawer_height.description: Change the drawer height, number of lines shown. This is resizeable in use as well

extended_popup_description.title: Extend Popup Description
extended_popup_description.description: Shows the issue description box in popup

extended_popup_milestone.title: Extend Popup Milestone
extended_popup_milestone.description: Show the issue milestone box in popup

extended_popup_project.title: Extend Popup Project
extended_popup_project.description: Show the issue project box in popup

extended_popup_assignee.title: Extend Popup Assignee
extended_popup_assignee.description: Show the users assigned box in popup

extended_popup_label.title: Extend Popup Label
extended_popup_label.description: Show the issue labels box in popup
